title: Microstructure Analysis of Advanced High-Strength Steels
description: Research project investigating the relationship between heat treatment parameters and microstructural evolution in advanced high-strength steels for automotive applications.

title: Corrosion Resistance Enhancement of Stainless Steels
description: Experimental study on improving the corrosion resistance of austenitic stainless steels through surface modification techniques and heat treatment processes.

title: Mechanical Properties Database for Engineering Materials
description: Development of a comprehensive database of mechanical properties for various engineering materials, including metals, ceramics, and composites.

title: Failure Analysis of Industrial Components
description: Systematic investigation of failed industrial components to determine root causes and recommend preventive measures for future failures.

title: Heat Treatment Optimization for Tool Steels
description: Experimental optimization of heat treatment parameters for tool steels to achieve optimal hardness, wear resistance, and toughness for industrial applications.

title: Additive Manufacturing of Metallic Components
description: Investigation of process parameters in metal 3D printing and their effects on microstructure and mechanical properties of printed components.
